62typedef enum
63{

65 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PERIPH_IOS,

67 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_PERIPH_IOM1,

87typedef enum
88{

94 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_SRAM_192K,
95 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_SRAM_256K,
96 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_SRAM_320K,
97 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_SRAM_384K,
98 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_SRAM_448K,
99 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_SRAM_512K,
100 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_SRAM_576K,
101 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_SRAM_672K,
102 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_SRAM_768K,
103 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_FLASH_1M,
104 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_FLASH_2M,
105 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_CACHE,
106 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_ALL,
107 AM_HAL_PWRCTRL_MEM_MAX
108} am_hal_pwrctrl_mem_e;
